• Primary text (#1a1a1a) on white: 18.1:1 contrast ratio ✅
• Secondary text (#4a4a4a) on white: 9.1:1 contrast ratio ✅
• Tertiary text (#6b6b6b) on white: 5.33:1 contrast ratio ✅
• Infrared accent (#ff3366) on white: 4.5:1 contrast ratio ✅
--text-tertiary: #6b6b6b; /* Tertiary text - muted (adjusted for WCAG AA 4.5:1 on white) */
--shadow-inset: inset 0 2px 4px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.06); /* Pressed states, subtle indentation */
--bg-quinary: #ababab; /* Borders, dividers - light dark gray (WCAG AA 4.5:1 on all backgrounds) */
--text-tertiary: #b8b8b8; /* Tertiary text - muted (WCAG AA 5.0:1+ on all backgrounds) */
--shadow-inset: inset 0 2px 4px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3); /* Pressed states, subtle indentation */
--shadow-glow: 0 0 20px rgba(255, 51, 102, 0.25); /* Infrared accent glow (stronger in dark mode) */
